title: House For Sale in Maharagama
details:
Very closed to Maharagama Town. Carpeted 20 feet road in front of house. Working distance to 341 maharagama katuwawala bus road. 3 Storied house , Newly Build complete house.One vehicle can park in the garage. One office room with 3 master bed rooms, one attached bathroom and one separate bathroom. one pantry , Large terrace at 3rd floor with one room, Two living rooms at ground floor and 1st floor.Highly residential area.

Immediate sale for migrate. Price Negotiable..
